Brooklyn Historical Society
Thomas Gascoyne certificate of sale
Gascoyne, Edward
Apfelbaum, Charles
Gascoyne, Thomas
1991.024
0.08 Linear Feet in one folder
1841-1845 This accession consists of one certificate of sale to Thomas Gascoyne for property in Brooklyn on Myrtle and Tillary Streets in 1841. The document also records the selling of the property by Edward Gascoyne to Jacque Cortelyou in 1845. A0116
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Thomas Gascoyne certificate of sale, 1991.024, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Gift of Charles Apfelbaum, 1991.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to users without restriction.
Certificates Real property |z New York (State) |z Kings County Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.) Bills of sale Cortelyou, Jaques Apfelbaum, Charles
